attributes.action: Ask the Prime Minister to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime Minister is portrayed as a decent individual who wants to do the right thing. If this is the case, then please resign for the sake of 60 million Britons....and not stay on for the sake of a few Labour ministers frightened for their jobs...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
